page.title: 14Glapthorn School at Present
page.content: There are three classes in the school and we are in class 3. There is a school bus and it stops in Oundle and Southwick. We can have school dinners or sandwiches. Mrs.Pridmore is our dinner lady. We have roasts and sausages and chips, for puddings we have biscuits, cake, crumble, semolina, rice pudding and tart. We have three playtimes, one in the morning, one at lunchtime and one in the afternoon. In the winter the boys do football and the girls do netball, in the summer we do rounders. The teachers are called Mrs. Green, Mrs. Machin and Mr. Palmer who is the headmaster. Mrs. Green teaches class 1, Mrs. Machin teaches class 2 and Mr. Palmer teaches class 3. Some of the lessons we do are English, Maths, Social Studies, Nature and Science. We also do swimming, cookery, country dancing and gym.
